sentence.Network_en: Geologically, not all volcanoes are the same.
sentence.Network_cn: 从地质学来说, 并不是所有火山都是相同的.

sentence.Network_en: Geologically speaking, this area is extremely interesting.
sentence.Network_cn: 从地质学上来说, 这个地方是极为有趣的.
